Reviews.Title: good capabilities, touch screen was fickle
Reviews.Author: Joshua Arzola
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone for my wife since it was advertised as a facebook and twitter phone. the phone is definitely facebook driven, it prompts you to log into your facebook account everytime you turn your phone on. i liked how there were multiple screens and your apps were dislayed as tiles... there's not much in the way of personalizing the phone to your tastes, you only have a limited number of apps to choose from as this is not an android phone. what i didn't like is the touchscreen technology. often times the sensor was off, you would select an app however the touchscreen would either select elsewhere on the screen or simply not respond to your touch. you would have to lock the phone, then unlock it in order for it to reset. i ended up returning this phone and purchasing a real smartphone. for the price, its ok. as long as you dont mind the limited apps and that its not a true smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfully terible
Reviews.Author: L. Yu
Reviews.Content: this is your motorola phone without andrioid, a small mistake screws up the damn phone, and using a diffrent charger promts the phone to need a new battery. I do not recomend this phone at all, it seems nokia phones do much better with the qwerty keyboard and cough its a facebook phone, and its screwbook app- is worthless compared to acessing fb online. it not only frequently crashes, the camera "send to fb" function is "send to a contact"

Reviews.Title: GOOD, NICE AND CHEAP / BUENO, BONITO, BARATO
Reviews.Author: KingMike
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD PHONE. GREAT PRICE. WORLD BEST KEYBOARD. NO ANDROID. APPLICATIONS WELL DO THE JOB. TELEPHONE BOOK NOT LIKE ME. THE WIFI IS GOOD. FM RADIO IS VERY GOOD. THE MP3 PLAYER IS VERY GOOD, TOO. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.MUY BUEN TELEFONO. EXCELENTE PRECIO. EL MEJOR TECLADO DEL MUNDO. NO ES ANDROID. SUS APLICACIONES HACEN BIEN EL TRABAJO. EL LIBRO DE TELEFONOS NO ME GUSTO. EL WIFI ES BUENO. TIENE RADIO FM MUY BUENA. EL MP3 PLAYER ES MUY BUENO, TAMBIEN. MUY RECOMENDADO.

Reviews.Title: Motorola Motokey with flip phone operating manual.
Reviews.Author: Benard Ikeokwu
Reviews.Content: Not only did the phone arrived late, the seller included a wrong operating manual with the phone. This is a motokey Motorola, which is not all that popular, the seller included a flip phone manual. I am still trying to figure out how to operate it. I don't want to return a phone because of manual, that is why I keep it.

Reviews.Title: ok but ...
Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: I didn't know the languages are only English and Chinese, that's too bad cause I gave it as a gift to a person that speaks Spanish

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: F. E. Belluso
Reviews.Content: so sorry i bought this phone... it is truly dedicated to facebook and youtube...if you are not familiar with cell phone's with touch screen dont buy this unit....the phone doesnt come with a manual for this phone.. but a generic manual for other phones not this one.... dumb  but true.....forget about texting, web browsing etc.... this wont do it.......only for facebookonce you get into facebook  one cant get out again.......no speaker phone......this phone is as i mentioned above dedicated to facebook.....on a scale of 1 to 10  i give it a minus 5....

Reviews.Title: smart phone listed as not
Reviews.Author: Aragon
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a non smart phone with the reviews as a smarter then most with out the data package and cost. so i get it in the mail put in my my 3g att sim card and there is no network connection no email or internet at all. What a piece of junk. on wifi i can get online. very poor internet. on a 1 to 10 rate i give it 1 jus because it does turn on.
